title: Please Identify this or similar typeface
content:
I was browsing around and I think this is 3 or 4th time I see this font. Please identify it for me. How do you guys identify fonts?

Thanks for your help.  
Cheers  
Michal

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [garland\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215605/http:/typophile.com/files/garland_logo.gif) | 3.12 KB |

 [‹ Anyone know what font these are?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45391 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please help identify this font!!!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45388 "Go to next forum topic")
author: michalU

comments.content:
I can’t seem to find any heavy scripts with the looped ’v’, and that ’s’ is unusual too. My best ideas are just similar: [Freehand 521](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215605/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=BT000342X1P1&start=1) (Mandate) and [Bello Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708215605/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/bello_script/?sample_text=heavens).

- Mike Yanega
